00064         Window::Window(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UILayer* Layer)
00065             : Widget(name,Layer)
00066         {
00067             RelPosition = Position;
00068             RelSize = Size;
00069             Type = Widget::Window;
00070 
00071             WindowBack = new Rectangle(Position,Size,Parent);
00072         }
00073 
00074         Window::~Window()
00075         {
00076             delete WindowBack;
00077             while(!Buttons.empty())
00078             {
00079                 UI::Button* button = Buttons.back().Object;
00080                 delete button;
00081                 Buttons.pop_back();
00082             }
00083             while(!Rectangles.empty())
00084             {
00085                 UI::Rectangle* rectangle = Rectangles.back().Object;
00086                 delete rectangle;
00087                 Rectangles.pop_back();
00088             }
00089             while(!Captions.empty())
00090             {
00091                 UI::Caption* caption = Captions.back().Object;
00092                 delete caption;
00093                 Captions.pop_back();
00094             }
00095             while(!MarkupTexts.empty())
00096             {
00097                 UI::MarkupText* markup = MarkupTexts.back().Object;
00098                 delete markup;
00099                 MarkupTexts.pop_back();
00100             }
00101             while(!Widgets.empty())
00102             {
00103                 UI::Widget* widget = Widgets.back().Object;
00104                 delete widget;
00105                 Widgets.pop_back();
00106             }
00107         }
00108 
00109         void Window::Update(bool Force)
00110         {
00111             if(!Force)
00112                 SubWidgetUpdate();
00113             MetaCode::ButtonState State = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00114             if(HoveredButton)
00115             {
00116             }
00117             else if(HoveredSubWidget)
00118             {
00119                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00120                 {
00121                     SubWidgetFocus = HoveredSubWidget;
00122                 }
00123             }
00124             if(SubWidgetFocus && (SubWidgetFocus != HoveredSubWidget))
00125             {
00126                 SubWidgetFocusUpdate(true);
00127             }
00128             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State && Force)
00129             {
00130                 SubWidgetFocusUpdate(Force);
00131             }
00132             if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING == State)
00133             {
00134                 SubWidgetFocus = NULL;
00135             }
00136         }
00137 
00138         void Window::SetLocation(const Vector2 &Position)
00139         {
00140             WindowBack->SetActualPosition(Position);
00141             for( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00142             {
00143                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00144             }
00145             for( std::vector<OffsetRectangleInfo>::iterator it = Rectangles.begin() ; it != Rectangles.end() ; it++ )
00146             {
00147                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00148             }
00149             for( std::vector<OffsetCaptionInfo>::iterator it = Captions.begin() ; it != Captions.end() ; it++ )
00150             {
00151                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00152             }
00153             for( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00154             {
00155                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00156             }
00157             for( std::vector<OffsetWidgetInfo>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00158             {
00159                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00160             }
00161         }
00162 
00163         void Window::SetArea(const Vector2 &Size)
00164         {
00165             Vector2 OldSize = WindowBack->GetActualSize();
00166             Vector2 Position = WindowBack->GetActualPosition();
00167             WindowBack->SetActualSize(Size);
00168             for( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00169             {
00170                 (*it).Offset = CalculateOffset(Size,OldSize,(*it).Offset,(*it).Anchor);
00171                 if((*it).Tether != RT_TetherNone)
00172                     (*it).Object->SetActualSize(CalculateSize(Size,OldSize,(*it).Object->GetActualSize(),(*it).Tether));
00173                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00174             }
00175             for( std::vector<OffsetRectangleInfo>::iterator it = Rectangles.begin() ; it != Rectangles.end() ; it++ )
00176             {
00177                 (*it).Offset = CalculateOffset(Size,OldSize,(*it).Offset,(*it).Anchor);
00178                 if((*it).Tether != RT_TetherNone)
00179                     (*it).Object->SetActualSize(CalculateSize(Size,OldSize,(*it).Object->GetActualSize(),(*it).Tether));
00180                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00181             }
00182             for( std::vector<OffsetCaptionInfo>::iterator it = Captions.begin() ; it != Captions.end() ; it++ )
00183             {
00184                 (*it).Offset = CalculateOffset(Size,OldSize,(*it).Offset,(*it).Anchor);
00185                 if((*it).Tether != RT_TetherNone)
00186                     (*it).Object->SetActualSize(CalculateSize(Size,OldSize,(*it).Object->GetActualSize(),(*it).Tether));
00187                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00188             }
00189             for( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00190             {
00191                 (*it).Offset = CalculateOffset(Size,OldSize,(*it).Offset,(*it).Anchor);
00192                 //if((*it).Tether != RT_TetherNone)
00193                 //    (*it).Object->SetActualSize(CalculateSize(Size,OldSize,(*it).Object->GetActualSize(),(*it).Tether));
00194                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00195             }
00196             for( std::vector<OffsetWidgetInfo>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00197             {
00198                 (*it).Offset = CalculateOffset(Size,OldSize,(*it).Offset,(*it).Anchor);
00199                 if((*it).Tether != RT_TetherNone)
00200                     (*it).Object->SetActualSize(CalculateSize(Size,OldSize,(*it).Object->GetActualSize(),(*it).Tether));
00201                 (*it).Object->SetActualPosition(Position+(*it).Offset);
00202             }
00203         }
00204 
00205         Vector2 Window::CalculateOffset(const Vector2 NewSize, const Vector2 OldSize, const Vector2 EleOffset, UI::ResizeableAnchor Anchor)
00206         {
00207             Vector2 NewOffset;
00208             switch (Anchor)
00209             {
00210                 case RA_AnchorTopLeft:
00211                 {
00212                     NewOffset = EleOffset;
00213                     break;
00214                 }
00215                 case RA_AnchorTop:
00216                 {
00217                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X + ((NewSize.X - OldSize.X) * 0.5);
00218                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y;
00219                     break;
00220                 }
00221                 case RA_AnchorTopRight:
00222                 {
00223                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X + (NewSize.X - OldSize.X);
00224                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y;
00225                     break;
00226                 }
00227                 case RA_AnchorLeft:
00228                 {
00229                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X;
00230                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y + ((NewSize.Y - OldSize.Y) * 0.5);
00231                     break;
00232                 }
00233                 case RA_AnchorMiddle:
00234                 {
00235                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X + ((NewSize.X - OldSize.X) * 0.5);
00236                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y + ((NewSize.Y - OldSize.Y) * 0.5);
00237                     break;
00238                 }
00239                 case RA_AnchorRight:
00240                 {
00241                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X + (NewSize.X - OldSize.X);
00242                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y + ((NewSize.Y - OldSize.Y) * 0.5);
00243                     break;
00244                 }
00245                 case RA_AnchorBottomLeft:
00246                 {
00247                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X;
00248                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y + (NewSize.Y - OldSize.Y);
00249                     break;
00250                 }
00251                 case RA_AnchorBottom:
00252                 {
00253                     NewOffset.X = EleOffset.X + ((NewSize.X - OldSize.X) * 0.5);
00254                     NewOffset.Y = EleOffset.Y + (NewSize.Y - OldSize.Y);
00255                     break;
00256                 }
00257                 case RA_AnchorBottomRight:
00258                 {
00259                     NewOffset = EleOffset + (NewSize - OldSize);
00260                     break;
00261                 }
00262                 default:
00263                     return NewOffset;
00264             }
00265             return NewOffset;
00266         }
00267 
00268         Vector2 Window::CalculateSize(const Vector2 NewSize, const Vector2 OldSize, const Vector2 EleSize, UI::ResizeableTether Tether)
00269         {
00270             Vector2 NewEleSize;
00271             switch (Tether)
00272             {
00273                 case RT_TetherBoth:
00274                 {
00275                     NewEleSize = EleSize + (NewSize - OldSize);
00276                     break;
00277                 }
00278                 case RT_TetherNone:
00279                 {
00280                     NewEleSize = EleSize;
00281                     break;
00282                 }
00283                 case RT_TetherHorizontal:
00284                 {
00285                     NewEleSize.X = EleSize.X + (NewSize.X - OldSize.X);
00286                     NewEleSize.Y = EleSize.Y;
00287                     break;
00288                 }
00289                 case RT_TetherVertical:
00290                 {
00291                     NewEleSize.X = EleSize.X;
00292                     NewEleSize.Y = EleSize.Y + (NewSize.Y - OldSize.Y);
00293                     break;
00294                 }
00295                 default:
00296                     return NewEleSize;
00297             }
00298             return NewEleSize;
00299         }
00300 
00301         void Window::SetVisible(bool visible)
00302         {
00303             if(Visible == visible)
00304                 return;
00305             //WindowTitle->SetVisible(visible);
00306             WindowBack->SetVisible(visible);
00307             for( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00308             {
00309                 (*it).Object->SetVisible(visible);
00310             }
00311             for( std::vector<OffsetRectangleInfo>::iterator it = Rectangles.begin() ; it != Rectangles.end() ; it++ )
00312             {
00313                 (*it).Object->SetVisible(visible);
00314             }
00315             for( std::vector<OffsetCaptionInfo>::iterator it = Captions.begin() ; it != Captions.end() ; it++ )
00316             {
00317                 (*it).Object->SetVisible(visible);
00318             }
00319             for( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00320             {
00321                 (*it).Object->SetVisible(visible);
00322             }
00323             for( std::vector<OffsetWidgetInfo>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00324             {
00325                 (*it).Object->SetVisible(visible);
00326             }
00327             Visible = visible;
00328         }
00329 
00330         bool Window::IsVisible()
00331         {
00332             return Visible;
00333         }
00334 
00335         void Window::Show()
00336         {
00337             if(Visible)
00338                 return;
00339             //WindowTitle->Show();
00340             WindowBack->Show();
00341             for( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00342             {
00343                 (*it).Object->Show();
00344             }
00345             for( std::vector<OffsetRectangleInfo>::iterator it = Rectangles.begin() ; it != Rectangles.end() ; it++ )
00346             {
00347                 (*it).Object->Show();
00348             }
00349             for( std::vector<OffsetCaptionInfo>::iterator it = Captions.begin() ; it != Captions.end() ; it++ )
00350             {
00351                 (*it).Object->Show();
00352             }
00353             for( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00354             {
00355                 (*it).Object->Show();
00356             }
00357             for( std::vector<OffsetWidgetInfo>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00358             {
00359                 (*it).Object->Show();
00360             }
00361             Visible = true;
00362         }
00363 
00364         void Window::Hide()
00365         {
00366             if(!Visible)
00367                 return;
00368             //WindowTitle->Hide();
00369             WindowBack->Hide();
00370             for( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00371             {
00372                 (*it).Object->Hide();
00373             }
00374             for( std::vector<OffsetRectangleInfo>::iterator it = Rectangles.begin() ; it != Rectangles.end() ; it++ )
00375             {
00376                 (*it).Object->Hide();
00377             }
00378             for( std::vector<OffsetCaptionInfo>::iterator it = Captions.begin() ; it != Captions.end() ; it++ )
00379             {
00380                 (*it).Object->Hide();
00381             }
00382             for( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00383             {
00384                 (*it).Object->Hide();
00385             }
00386             for( std::vector<OffsetWidgetInfo>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00387             {
00388                 (*it).Object->Hide();
00389             }
00390             Visible = false;
00391         }

00393         Rectangle* Window::GetWindowBack()
00394         {
00395             return WindowBack;

00397 
00398         bool Window::CheckMouseHover()
00399         {
00400             if(!Visible)
00401                 return false;
00402             if(HoveredButton)
00403             {
00404                 if(HoveredButton->CheckMouseHover())
00405                     return true;
00406             }
00407             if(HoveredSubWidget)
00408             {
00409                 if(HoveredSubWidget->CheckMouseHover())
00410                     return true;
00411             }
00412             for( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00413             {
00414                 if((*it).Object->CheckMouseHover())
00415                 {
00416                     HoveredSubWidget = NULL;
00417                     HoveredButton = (*it).Object;
00418                     return true;
00419                 }
00420             }
00421             for( std::vector<OffsetWidgetInfo>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00422             {
00423                 if((*it).Object->CheckMouseHover())
00424                 {
00425                     HoveredSubWidget = (*it).Object;
00426                     HoveredButton = NULL;
00427                     return true;
00428                 }
00429             }
00430             if(WindowBack->CheckMouseHover())
00431             {
00432                 HoveredSubWidget = NULL;
00433                 HoveredButton = NULL;
00434                 return true;
00435             }
00436             HoveredSubWidget = NULL;
00437             HoveredButton = NULL;
00438             return false;
00439         }

00442         {
00443             RelPosition = Position;
00444             Vector2 ActPos = Position * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00445             SetLocation(ActPos);

00487         Button* Window::CreateButton(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00488         {
00489             Vector2 Offset = Position - RelPosition;
00490             OffsetButtonInfo button(new Button(Name, Position, Size, Parent),UI::RA_AnchorMiddle,UI::RT_TetherBoth,Offset);
00491             Buttons.push_back(button);
00492             return button.Object;
00493         }
00494 
00495         TextButton* Window::CreateTextButton(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, const Whole Glyph, ConstString Text)
00496         {
00497             Vector2 Offset = Position - RelPosition;
00498             TextButton* tbutton = new TextButton(Name, Position, Size, Glyph, Text, Parent);
00499             OffsetButtonInfo tbuttoninfo(tbutton,UI::RA_AnchorMiddle,UI::RT_TetherBoth,Offset);
00500             Buttons.push_back(tbuttoninfo);
00501             return tbutton;
00502         }
00503 
00504         Button* Window::GetButton(ConstString& Name)
00505         {
00506             for ( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00507             {
00508                 if ( Name == (*it).Object->GetName() )
00509                 {
00510                     Button* button = (*it).Object;
00511                     return button;
00512                 }
00513             }
00514             return 0;
00515         }
00516 
00517         Button* Window::GetButton(const Whole Index)
00518         {
00519             return Buttons[Index].Object;
00520         }

00522         OffsetButtonInfo* Window::GetOffsetButtonInfo(ConstString& Name)
00523         {
00524             for ( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00525             {
00526                 if ( Name == (*it).Object->GetName() )
00527                 {
00528                     OffsetButtonInfo* Offset = &(*it);
00529                     return Offset;
00530                 }
00531             }
00532             return 0;
00533         }

00546         void Window::DestroyButton(Button* ToBeDestroyed)
00547         {
00548             for ( std::vector<OffsetButtonInfo>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00549             {
00550                 if ( ToBeDestroyed == (*it).Object )
00551                 {
00552                     delete ToBeDestroyed;
00553                     Buttons.erase(it);
00554                     return;
00555                 }
00556             }
00557         }

00564             return rectangle.Object;

00659         MarkupText* Window::CreateMarkupText(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Whole Glyph, String Text)
00660         {
00661             Vector2 Offset = Position - RelPosition;
00662             MarkupText* markup = new MarkupText(Name,Position,Glyph,Text,Parent);
00663             OffsetMarkupTextInfo markupinfo(markup,UI::RA_AnchorMiddle,UI::RT_TetherBoth,Offset);
00664             MarkupTexts.push_back(markupinfo);
00665             return markupinfo.Object;
00666         }

00668         MarkupText* Window::GetMarkupText(ConstString& Name)
00669         {
00670             for ( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00671             {
00672                 if ( Name == (*it).Object->GetName() )
00673                 {
00674                     MarkupText* markup = (*it).Object;
00675                     return markup;
00676                 }
00677             }
00678             return 0;
00679         }

00682         {
00683             return MarkupTexts[Index].Object;
00684         }

00689             {
00690                 if ( Name == (*it).Object->GetName() )
00691                 {
00692                     OffsetMarkupTextInfo* Offset = &(*it);
00693                     return Offset;
00694                 }
00695             }
00696             return 0;

00710         void Window::DestroyMarkupText(MarkupText* ToBeDestroyed)
00711         {
00712             for ( std::vector<OffsetMarkupTextInfo>::iterator it = MarkupTexts.begin() ; it != MarkupTexts.end() ; it++ )
00713             {
00714                 if ( ToBeDestroyed == (*it).Object )
00715                 {
00716                     delete ToBeDestroyed;
00717                     MarkupTexts.erase(it);
00718                     return;
00719                 }
00720             }
00721         }

00727                 if ( Name == (*it).Object->GetName() )
00728                 {
00729                     Widget* widget = (*it).Object;
00730                     return widget;
00731                 }
00732             }
00733             return 0;
00734         }
